name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Rainbow Batman
name_original: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Rainbow Batman
description:
LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Rainbow Batman is an arcade game. It came out on 20-01-2015. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC: Rainbow Batman on PC.
